remarks: The composition of two curried functions is jointly continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnmptkk.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmptkk.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
cnmptkk.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` Z ) ) $.
cnmptkk.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( TopOn ` W ) ) $.
cnmptkk.n $e |- ( ph -> L e. N-Locally Comp ) $.
cnmptkk.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( y e. Y |-> A ) ) e. ( J Cn ( L ^ko K ) ) ) $.
cnmptkk.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( z e. Z |-> B ) ) e. ( J Cn ( M ^ko L ) ) ) $.
cnmptkk.c $e |- ( z = A -> B = C ) $.
cnmptkk $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( y e. Y |-> C ) ) e. ( J Cn ( M ^ko K ) ) ) $.
